connect

public void connect()
Establishes a connection to the online service. Requires an internet connection.

Specified by:
connect in interface AbstractMagicTheGatheringService

disconnect

public void disconnect()
Establishes that Business Search data should be retrieved locally. This does not require an internet connection.

If data is being retrieved locally, you must be sure that your parameters match locally stored data. Otherwise, you will get nothing in return.

Specified by:
disconnect in interface AbstractMagicTheGatheringService

getClientStore

public ClientStore getClientStore()
**For internal use only!** The ClientStore is the internal cache where offline data is stored.
